main_window_tasks_query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.IterationPath], [KL.RND.ExpectedResolveDate] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.Reason] = 'New' AND [System.State] = 'Proposed' AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me) ORDER BY [KL.RND.ExpectedResolveDate] DESC, [System.Id] DESC
main_window_bugs_query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug' AND NOT [System.State] CONTAINS 'Closed' AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] < 3) ORDER BY [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] ASC
main_window_crs_query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.IterationPath] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Change Request' AND [System.State] = 'Proposed' AND [KL.Stage] = 'Waiting Estimation' AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me) ORDER BY [System.Id] DESC
main_window_brqs_query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.IterationPath], [KL.PrioIndexDouble] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Requirement' AND [System.State] = 'Proposed' AND [KL.Stage] = 'Waiting Analysis' AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me ORDER BY [KL.PrioIndexDouble] ASC)
